snippet: After defenseman Keith Ballard was sent to a hospital when he hit his head on the ice after a hit from Matt Martin, Minnesota stormed back from a three-goal deficit.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Minnesota Wild beat New York Islanders, 5-4; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: After defenseman Keith Ballard was sent to a hospital when he hit his head on the ice after a hit from Matt Martin, Minnesota stormed back from a three-goal deficit.

headline.main: Furious Comeback Gives Wild a Victory Over the Islanders
headline.print_headline: Furious Comeback Gives Wild a Victory Over the Islanders
